name: Tony the Geek
tagline: A simple webpage of my work and other things.
body:
## Welcome to Tony's GitHub Page

### A Brief Introduction of Me
I'm Tony, and I'm trying to be a geek.

### Things I Learned
- MCUs such as 8051, AVR, STM32, MK60(Freescale) etc.
- Web front side languages, HTML, JS, CSS.
- Verilog HDL on FPGA.
- Basic Linux tips. 

### Things I'm Learning Now
- Linux programming, using C, Python and Shell.
- TCP/IP
- Raspberry Pi

### SNS
Weibo:[@Tony_the_geek](http://weibo.com/724123001)

Blog:[Tony_the_geek的博客](http://blog.csdn.net/wsstony579)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
